title: 3D-Level editor for game-devs
description: Content creation for level-based games in 3D is very resource and time-consuming. There is no open source modular framework for game devs.
solution: Procedural 3D-modeling/level editor framework to assist game-devs building a new generation of distributed community-based blockchain-games!
experience: Full stack Developer, creator of procedural-modeling tools, Generative Artist, Plutus Pioneer, UX-Designer
